   22: %% 
   23: %% ct:run("../inets_test", httpd_SUITE).
   24: %%
   25: -compile({no_auto_import,[alias/1]}).
   26: -module(httpd_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("kernel/include/file.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   30: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("inets/include/httpd.hrl").
   32: -include("inets_test_lib.hrl").
   33: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   34: %% Note: This directive should only be used in test suites.
   35: -compile(export_all).
   36: 
   37: -record(httpd_user,  {user_name, password, user_data}).
   38: -record(httpd_group, {group_name, userlist}).
   39: -define(MAX_HEADER_SIZE, 256).
   40: %% Minutes before failed auths timeout.
   41: -define(FAIL_EXPIRE_TIME,1). 
   42: %% Seconds before successful auths timeout.
   43: -define(AUTH_TIMEOUT,5).
   44: -define(URL_START, "http://").
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: suite() ->
   50:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   51:      {timetrap,{seconds, 120}}
   52:     ].
   53: 
   54: all() ->
   55:     [
   56:      {group, http_basic},
   57:      {group, https_basic},
   58:      {group, http_limit},
   59:      {group, https_limit},
   60:      {group, http_custom},
   61:      {group, https_custom},
   62:      {group, https_custom},
   63:      {group, http_basic_auth},
   64:      {group, https_basic_auth},
   65:      {group, http_auth_api},
   66:      {group, https_auth_api},
   67:      {group, http_auth_api_dets},
   68:      {group, https_auth_api_dets},
   69:      {group, http_auth_api_mnesia},
   70:      {group, https_auth_api_mnesia},
   71:      {group, http_security}, 
   72:      {group, https_security},
   73:      {group, http_reload},
   74:      {group, https_reload},
   75:      {group, http_mime_types},
   76:      {group, http_logging},
   77:      {group, http_post},
   78:      {group, http_rel_path_script_alias},
   79:      {group, http_not_sup},
   80:      {group, https_alert},
   81:      {group, https_not_sup},
   82:      mime_types_format,
   83:      erl_script_timeout_default,
   84:      erl_script_timeout_option,
   85:      erl_script_timeout_proplist,
   86:      erl_script_alias_all
   87:     ].
   88: 
   89: groups() ->
   90:     [
   91:      {http_basic, [], basic_groups()},
   92:      {https_basic, [], basic_groups()},
   93:      {http_limit, [], [{group, limit}]},
   94:      {https_limit, [], [{group, limit}]},
   95:      {http_custom, [], [{group,  custom}]},
   96:      {https_custom, [], [{group,  custom}]},
   97:      {http_basic_auth, [], [{group, basic_auth}]},
   98:      {https_basic_auth, [], [{group, basic_auth}]},
   99:      {http_auth_api, [], [{group, auth_api}]},
  100:      {https_auth_api, [], [{group, auth_api}]},
  101:      {http_auth_api_dets, [], [{group, auth_api_dets}]},
  102:      {https_auth_api_dets, [], [{group, auth_api_dets}]},
  103:      {http_auth_api_mnesia, [], [{group, auth_api_mnesia}]}, 
  104:      {https_auth_api_mnesia, [], [{group, auth_api_mnesia}]},
  105:      {http_security, [], [{group, security}]},
  106:      {https_security, [], [{group, security}]},
  107:      {http_logging, [], [{group, logging}]},
  108:      {http_reload, [], [{group, reload}]},
  109:      {https_reload, [], [{group, reload}]},
  110:      {http_post, [], [{group, post}]},
  111:      {http_not_sup, [], [{group, not_sup}]},
  112:      {https_not_sup, [], [{group, not_sup}]},
  113:      {https_alert, [], [tls_alert]},
  114:      {http_mime_types, [], [alias_1_1, alias_1_0]},
  115:      {limit, [],  [content_length, max_clients_1_1]},  
  116:      {custom, [],  [customize, add_default]},  
  117:      {reload, [], [non_disturbing_reconfiger_dies,
  118: 		   disturbing_reconfiger_dies,
  119: 		   non_disturbing_1_1, 
  120: 		   non_disturbing_1_0,
  121:            disturbing_1_1,
  122:            disturbing_1_0,
  123: 		   reload_config_file
  124: 		  ]},
  125:      {post, [], [chunked_post, chunked_chunked_encoded_post, post_204]},
  126:      {basic_auth, [], [basic_auth_1_1, basic_auth_1_0, verify_href_1_1]},
  127:      {auth_api, [], [auth_api_1_1, auth_api_1_0]},
  128:      {auth_api_dets, [], [auth_api_1_1, auth_api_1_0]},
  129:      {auth_api_mnesia, [], [auth_api_1_1, auth_api_1_0]},
  130:      {security, [], [security_1_1, security_1_0]},
  131:      {logging, [], [disk_log_internal, disk_log_exists,
  132:              disk_log_bad_size, disk_log_bad_file]},
  133:      {http_1_1, [],
  134:       [host, chunked, expect, cgi, cgi_chunked_encoding_test,
  135:        trace, range, if_modified_since, mod_esi_chunk_timeout,
  136:        esi_put, esi_patch, esi_post, esi_proagate, esi_atom_leak, esi_headers]
  137:       ++ http_head() ++ http_get() ++ load()},
  138:      {http_1_0, [], [host, cgi, trace] ++ http_head() ++ http_get() ++ load()},
  139:      {http_rel_path_script_alias, [], [cgi]},
  140:      {not_sup, [], [put_not_sup]}
  141:     ].
  142: 
  143: basic_groups ()->
  144:     [{group, http_1_1},
  145:      {group, http_1_0}
  146:     ].
  147: 
  148: http_head() ->
  149:     [head].
  150: http_get() ->
  151:     [alias, 
  152:      get, 
  153:      bad_dot_paths,
  154:      %%actions, Add configuration so that this test mod_action
  155:      esi, 
  156:      bad_hex, 
  157:      missing_CR,
  158:      max_header,
  159:      max_content_length,
  160:      ignore_invalid_header,
  161:      ipv6,
  162:      same_file_name_dir_name
  163:     ].
  164: 
  165: 
  166: load() ->
  167:     [light, medium 
  168:      %%,heavy
  169:     ]. 
  170:     
  171: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  172:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  173:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  174:     inets_test_lib:stop_apps([inets]),
  175:     ServerRoot = filename:join(PrivDir, "server_root"),
  176:     inets_test_lib:del_dirs(ServerRoot),
  177:     DocRoot = filename:join(ServerRoot, "htdocs"),
  178:     setup_tmp_dir(PrivDir),
  179:     setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir),
  180:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
  181:     logger:add_handler_filter(default, inets_httpd, {fun logger_filters:domain/2,
  182:                                                      {log, equal,[otp,inets, httpd, httpd_test, error]}}),
  183:     %%logger:set_handler_config(default, formatter, {logger_formatter, #{}}),
  184:     Inet = 
  185: 	case (catch ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
  186: 	    undefined ->
  187: 		inet;
  188: 	    Hosts when is_list(Hosts) ->
  189: 		case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), Hosts) of
  190: 		    true ->
  191: 			inet6;
  192: 		    false ->
  193: 			inet
  194: 		end;
  195: 	    _ ->
  196: 		inet
  197: 	end,
  198:     [{server_root, ServerRoot}, 
  199:      {doc_root, DocRoot},
  200:      {ipfamily, Inet},
  201:      {node,             node()},
  202:      {host,             inets_test_lib:hostname()}, 
  203:      {address,          getaddr()} | Config].
  204: 
  205: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  206:     ok.
  207: 
  208: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  209: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == https_basic;
  210: 				    Group == https_limit;
  211: 				    Group == https_custom;
  212: 				    Group == https_basic_auth;
  213: 				    Group == https_auth_api;
  214: 				    Group == https_auth_api_dets;
  215: 				    Group == https_auth_api_mnesia;
  216: 				    Group == https_security;
  217: 				    Group == https_reload;
  218:                                     Group == https_not_sup;
  219:                                     Group == https_alert
  220: 				    ->
  221:     catch crypto:stop(),
  222:     try crypto:start() of
  223:         ok ->
  224:             init_ssl(Group,  [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config0])
  225:     catch
  226:         _:_ ->
  227:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  228:     end; 
  229: init_per_group(Group, Config0)  when  Group == http_basic;
  230: 				      Group == http_limit;
  231: 				      Group == http_custom;
  232: 				      Group == http_basic_auth;
  233: 				      Group == http_auth_api;
  234: 				      Group == http_auth_api_dets;
  235: 				      Group == http_auth_api_mnesia;
  236: 				      Group == http_security;
  237: 				      Group == http_reload;
  238:                                       Group == http_not_sup;
  239:                                       Group == http_post;
  240:                                       Group == http_mime_types
  241: 				      ->
  242:     ok = start_apps(Group),
  243:     init_httpd(Group, [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"}, {type, ip_comm} | Config0]);
  244: init_per_group(http_1_1, Config) ->
  245:     [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config];
  246: init_per_group(http_1_0, Config) ->
  247:     [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config];
  248: init_per_group(auth_api, Config) -> 
  249:     [{auth_prefix, ""} | Config];
  250: init_per_group(auth_api_dets, Config) -> 
  251:     [{auth_prefix, "dets_"} | Config];
  252: init_per_group(auth_api_mnesia, Config) ->
  253:     start_mnesia(proplists:get_value(node, Config)),
  254:     [{auth_prefix, "mnesia_"} | Config];
  255: init_per_group(http_logging, Config) ->
  256:     Config1 = [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config],
  257:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config1),
  258:     Path = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  259:     [{transfer_log, Path} | Config1];
  260: init_per_group(http_rel_path_script_alias = Group, Config) ->
  261:     ok = start_apps(Group),
  262:     init_httpd(Group, [{type, ip_comm},{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"}| Config]);
  263: init_per_group(not_sup, Config) ->
  264:     [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config];
  265: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  266:     Config.
  267: 
  268: end_per_group(Group, _Config)  when  Group == http_basic;
  269: 				     Group == http_limit;
  270: 				     Group == http_basic_auth;
  271: 				     Group == http_auth_api;
  272: 				     Group == http_auth_api_dets;
  273: 				     Group == http_auth_api_mnesia;
  274: 				     Group == http_security;
  275: 				     Group == http_reload;
  276:                                      Group == http_post;
  277:                                      Group == http_mime_types
  278: 				     ->
  279:     inets:stop();
  280: end_per_group(Group, _Config) when  Group == https_basic;
  281: 				    Group == https_limit;
  282: 				    Group == https_basic_auth;
  283: 				    Group == https_auth_api;
  284: 				    Group == https_auth_api_dets;
  285: 				    Group == https_auth_api_mnesia;
  286: 				    Group == https_security;
  287: 				    Group == https_reload
  288: 				    ->
  289:     ssl:stop(),
  290:     inets:stop();
  291: 
  292: end_per_group(auth_api_mnesia, _) ->
  293:     cleanup_mnesia();
  294: 
  295: end_per_group(_, _) ->
  296:     ok.
  297: 
  298: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  299: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when Case == host; Case == trace ->
  300:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 40}),
  301:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  302:     Name = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  303:     Cb = case Name of
  304: 	     http_1_0 ->
  305: 		 httpd_1_0;
  306: 	     http_1_1 ->
  307: 		 httpd_1_1
  308: 	 end,
  309:     dbg(
  310:       Case,
  311:       [{version_cb, Cb} | proplists:delete(version_cb, Config)],
  312:       init);
  313: 
  314: init_per_testcase(range, Config) ->
  315:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  316:     DocRoot = proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config),
  317:     create_range_data(DocRoot),
  318:     dbg(range, Config, init);
  319: 
  320: init_per_testcase(disk_log_internal, Config0) ->
  321:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  322:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  323:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  324:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  325: 
  326: init_per_testcase(disk_log_exists, Config0) ->
  327:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
  328:     Filename = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  329:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name, Filename}, {file, Filename},
  330:             {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
  331:             {type, wrap}, {size, {1048576, 5}}]),
  332:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, {bogus, node(), self()}),
  333:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
  334:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  335:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  336:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  337:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  338: 
  339: init_per_testcase(disk_log_bad_size, Config0) ->
  340:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
  341:     Filename = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  342:     {ok, Log} = disk_log:open([{name, Filename}, {file, Filename},
  343:             {repair, truncate}, {format, internal},
  344:             {type, wrap}, {size, {1048576, 5}}]),
  345:     ok = disk_log:log(Log, {bogus, node(), self()}),
  346:     ok = disk_log:close(Log),
  347:     ok = file:delete(Filename ++ ".siz"),
  348:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  349:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  350:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  351:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  352: 
  353: init_per_testcase(disk_log_bad_file, Config0) ->
  354:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
  355:     Filename = ServerRoot ++ "/httpd_log_transfer",
  356:     ok = file:write_file(Filename ++ ".1", <<>>),
  357:     ok = start_apps(http_logging),
  358:     Config1 = init_httpd(http_logging, [{type, ip_comm} | Config0]),
  359:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  360:     dbg(disk_log_internal, Config1, init);
  361: 
  362: init_per_testcase(erl_script_timeout_default, Config) ->
  363:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 60}),
  364:     dbg(erl_script_timeout_default, Config, init);
  365: init_per_testcase(medium = Case, Config) ->
  366:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 150}),
  367:     dbg(Case, Config, init);
  368: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  369:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
  370:     dbg(Case, Config, init).
  371: 
  372: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when
  373:         Case == disk_log_internal;
  374:         Case == disk_log_exists;
  375:         Case == disk_log_bad_size;
  376:         Case == disk_log_bad_file ->
  377:     inets:stop(),
  378:     dbg(Case, Config, 'end');
  379: 
  380: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  381:     dbg(Case, Config, 'end').
  382: 
  383: 
  384: dbg(Case, Config, Status) ->
  385:     Cases = [esi_put],
  386:     case lists:member(Case, Cases) of
  387: 	true ->
  388: 	    case Status of
  389: 		init ->
  390: 		    dbg:tracer(),
  391: 		    dbg:p(all, c),
  392: 		    dbg:tpl(httpd_example, cx),
  393: 		    dbg:tpl(mod_esi, generate_webpage, cx),
  394: 		    io:format("dbg: started~n"),
  395: 		    Config;
  396: 		'end' ->
  397: 		    io:format("dbg: stopped~n"),
  398: 		    dbg:stop_clear(),
  399: 		    ok
  400: 	    end;
  401: 	false ->
  402: 	    case Status of
  403: 		init ->
  404: 		    Config;
  405: 		'end' ->
  406: 		    ok
  407: 	    end
  408:     end.
  409: 
  410: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  411: %% Test cases starts here.
  412: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  413: 
  414: head() ->
  415:     [{doc, "HTTP HEAD request for static page"}].
  416: 
  417: head(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  418:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  419:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  420:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  421: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  422:                                        proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  423: 				       http_request("HEAD /index.html ", Version, Host),
  424: 				       [{statuscode, head_status(Version, 200)},
  425: 					{version, Version}]),
  426:     
  427:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  428: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  429: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  430: 				       http_request("HEAD /open/ ", Version, Host),
  431: 				       [{statuscode, head_status(Version, 403)},
  432: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  433: 					{header, "Date"},
  434: 					{header, "Server"},
  435: 					{version, Version}]).
  436: 
  437: get() ->
  438:     [{doc, "HTTP GET request for static page"}].
  439: 
  440: get(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  441:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  442:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  443:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  444:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  445: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  446: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  447: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  448: 				       http_request("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
  449: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
  450: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  451: 					{header, "Date"},
  452: 					{header, "Server"},
  453: 					{version, Version}]),
  454:     
  455:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  456: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  457: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  458: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  459: 				       http_request("GET /open/ ", Version, Host),
  460: 				       [{statuscode, 403},
  461: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  462: 					{header, "Date"},
  463: 					{header, "Server"},
  464: 					{version, Version}]),
  465: 
  466:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
  467: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  468: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  469: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  470: 				       http_request("GET /.%252e/.%252e/.%252e/.%252e/.%252e/home/ ", Version, Host),
  471: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  472: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  473: 					{header, "Date"},
  474: 					{header, "Server"},
  475: 					{version, Version}]).
  476: 
  477: bad_dot_paths() ->
  478:     [{doc, "Do not allow ..-paths to acesse files outside of doc root"}].
  479: bad_dot_paths(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  480:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  481:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  482:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  483:     
  484:     BadDotPath0 = "/..%2f..%2f...%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2fetc/passwd ",
  485:     BadDotPath1 = "/..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2f..%2fetc/passwd ",
  486:     BadDotPath2 = "/%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2f%2e%2e%2fetc/passwd ",
  487:     
  488:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  489: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  490: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  491: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  492: 				       http_request("GET " ++ BadDotPath0 , Version, Host),
  493: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  494: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  495: 					{header, "Date"},
  496: 					{header, "Server"},
  497: 					{version, Version}]),
  498:     
  499:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
  500: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
  501: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  502: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  503: 				       http_request("GET " ++ BadDotPath1, Version, Host),
  504: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  505: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  506: 					{header, "Date"},
  507: 					{header, "Server"},
  508: 					{version, Version}]),
  509:     
  510:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
  511: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  512: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
  513: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  514: 				       http_request("GET " ++ BadDotPath2, Version, Host),
  515: 				       [{statuscode, 404},
  516: 					{header, "Content-Type", "text/html"},
  517: 					{header, "Date"},
  518: 					{header, "Server"},
  519: 					{version, Version}]).
  520:     
  521: basic_auth_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  522:     basic_auth([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  523: 
  524: basic_auth_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  525:     basic_auth([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
  526: 
  527: basic_auth() ->
  528:     [{doc, "Test Basic authentication with WWW-Authenticate header"}].
  529: 
  530: basic_auth(Config) ->
  531:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  532:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  533:     basic_auth_requiered(Config),
  534:     %% Authentication OK! ["one:OnePassword" user first in user list]
  535:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  536: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  537:     %% Authentication OK and a directory listing is supplied!
  538:     %% ["Aladdin:open sesame" user second in user list]
  539:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  540: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  541:      %% User correct but wrong password! ["one:one" user first in user list]
  542:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "one", "one", Version, Host), Config, 
  543: 		     [{statuscode, 401},
  544: 		      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  545:     %% Make sure Authenticate header is received even the second time
  546:     %% we try a incorrect password! Otherwise a browser client will hang!
  547:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "one", "one", Version, Host), Config, 
  548: 		     [{statuscode, 401},
  549: 		      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  550:     %% Neither user or password correct! ["dummy:dummy"]
  551:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/dummy.html", "dummy", "dummy", Version, Host), Config, 
  552: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
  553:     %% Nested secret/top_secret OK! ["Aladdin:open sesame"]
  554:     ok = http_status(auth_request("/secret/top_secret/", "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host), 
  555: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  556:     %% Authentication still required!
  557:     basic_auth_requiered(Config).
  558: 
  559: verify_href_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  560:     verify_href([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  561: 
  562: verify_href() ->
  563:     [{doc, "Test generated hrefs (related to GH-4677), check that hrefs for dir listing work"}].
  564: 
  565: verify_href(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  566:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  567:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  568:     Go = fun(Path, User, Password, Opts) ->
  569:                  ct:pal("Navigating to ~p", [Path]),
  570:                  auth_status(auth_request(Path, User, Password, Version, Host),
  571:                              Config, Opts)
  572:          end,
  573:     {ok, Hrefs} = Go("/open/", "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", [{statuscode, 200}, {fetch_hrefs, true}]),
  574:     [ok = Go(H, "one", "onePassword", [{statuscode, 200}]) || H <- Hrefs],
  575:     ok.
  576: 
  577: auth_api_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  578:     auth_api([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  579: 
  580: auth_api_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  581:     auth_api([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
  582: 
  583: auth_api() ->
  584:     [{doc, "Test mod_auth API"}].
  585: 
  586: auth_api(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  587:     Prefix = proplists:get_value(auth_prefix, Config),
  588:     do_auth_api(Prefix, Config).
  589: 
  590: do_auth_api(AuthPrefix, Config) ->
  591:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  592:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  593:     Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  594:     Node = proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  595:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
  596:     ok = http_status("GET / ", Config,
  597:  		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  598:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/", "one", "WrongPassword", Version, Host), Config,
  599:  		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  600: 
  601:     %% Make sure Authenticate header is received even the second time
  602:     %% we try a incorrect password! Otherwise a browser client will hang!
  603:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  604:  				  "dummy", "WrongPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  605:  		     [{statuscode, 401},
  606:  		      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  607:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", "dummy", "WrongPassword", 
  608:  				  Version, Host), Config, [{statuscode, 401},	
  609:  						  {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
  610:     
  611:     %% Change the password to DummyPassword then try to add a user 
  612:     %% Get an error and set it to NoPassword
  613:     ok = update_password(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, 
  614: 			     "open", "NoPassword", "DummyPassword"),
  615:     {error,bad_password} = 
  616:  	add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "one", 
  617:  		 "onePassword", []),
  618:      ok = update_password(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "open",
  619: 			  "DummyPassword", "NoPassword"),
  620:   
  621:     %% Test /*open, require user one Aladdin
  622:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "open"),
  623:     
  624:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  625:      				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config,
  626: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
  627:     
  628:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  629: 				  "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
  630: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
  631:  
  632:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  633: 				  "Aladdin", "onePassword", Version, Host),
  634: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  635:     
  636:     true = add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "one", 
  637: 		    "onePassword", []),
  638:     true = add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "two", 
  639:      		    "twoPassword", []),
  640:     true = add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "open", "Aladdin", 
  641: 		    "AladdinPassword", []),
  642:     {ok, [_|_]} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  643:       			     AuthPrefix, "open"),
  644:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",
  645:       				  "one", "WrongPassword", Version, Host), 
  646:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  647:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  648:       				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), 
  649:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  650:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  651:       				  "two", "twoPassword",  Version, Host), 
  652:       		     Config,[{statuscode, 401}]),
  653:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/", 
  654:       				  "Aladdin", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), 
  655:       		     Config,[{statuscode, 401}]),
  656:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "open/",  
  657: 				  "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host), 
  658: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  659:     
  660:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "open"),
  661:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  662: 			  AuthPrefix, "open"),
  663:     
  664:     %% Phase 2
  665:       remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  666:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix,
  667: 			  "secret"),
  668:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  669:        				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), 
  670:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  671:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/", 
  672: 				    "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), 
  673: 		       Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  674:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/", 
  675:       				  "three", "threePassword", Version, Host),
  676:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  677:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", "one",
  678:       	     "onePassword", 
  679:       	     []),
  680:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", 
  681:       	     "two", "twoPassword", []),
  682:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", "Aladdin", 
  683: 	     "AladdinPassword",[]),
  684:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", 
  685:       		     "one", "group1"),
  686:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", 
  687:       		     "two", "group1"),
  688:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix,  
  689:       			 "secret", "Aladdin", "group2"),
  690:     {ok, Members} = list_group_members(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret", "group1"),
  691:     true = lists:member("one", Members),
  692:     true = lists:member("two", Members),
  693:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  694:       				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host),
  695:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  696:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/", 
  697: 				  "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  698: 		       Config,[{statuscode, 200}]),
  699:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  700:        				  "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host),
  701:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  702:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ "secret/",
  703:        				  "three", "threePassword", Version, Host), 
  704:        		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  705:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  706:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  707:        			  AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  708:     remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  709:     
  710:     {ok, []} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret"),
  711:     
  712:     %% Phase 3
  713:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  714:     remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  715:     
  716:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  717:       				      "secret/top_secret/",
  718:       				  "three", "threePassword", Version, Host),
  719:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  720:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  721:       				      "secret/top_secret/", "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  722:       		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  723:      add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix,
  724: 	      "secret/top_secret","three",
  725: 	      "threePassword",[]),
  726:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret",
  727:       	     "two","twoPassword", []),
  728:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret", "three", "group3"),
  729:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  730:      				      "secret/top_secret/", "three", "threePassword",
  731:      				  Version, Host), 
  732: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  733:      ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  734: 				       "secret/top_secret/", "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  735: 		      Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  736:     add_group_member(Node, ServerRoot, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret", "two", "group3"),
  737:      ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  738: 				       "secret/top_secret/",
  739: 				   "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host),
  740: 		      Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  741:      remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  742:     {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, 
  743:      			  AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  744:     remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, "secret/top_secret"),
  745:      {ok, []} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix,  "secret/top_secret"),
  746:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  747:        				      "secret/top_secret/", "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), 
  748: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
  749:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/" ++ AuthPrefix ++ 
  750:        				      "secret/top_secret/","three", "threePassword", Version, Host),
  751:        		     Config, [{statuscde, 401}]).
  752: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  753: ipv6() ->
  754:     [{require, ipv6_hosts},
  755:      {doc,"Test ipv6."}].
  756: ipv6(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  757:     {ok, Hostname0} = inet:gethostname(),
  758:      case lists:member(list_to_atom(Hostname0), ct:get_config(ipv6_hosts)) of
  759: 	 true ->
  760: 	     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  761: 	     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  762: 	     URI = http_request("GET / ", Version, Host),
  763: 	     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
  764:  					  proplists:get_value(port, Config), [inet6], 
  765: 					   proplists:get_value(code, Config), 
  766: 					   URI, 
  767: 					   [{statuscode, 200}, {version, Version}]);
  768: 	 false ->
  769: 	     {skip, "Host does not support IPv6"}
  770:      end.
  771: 
  772: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  773: same_file_name_dir_name() ->
  774:     [{doc,"Test that URI path that has a filename in it is not interpreted as the file"}].
  775: same_file_name_dir_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  776:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
  777:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  778:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  779:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host,
  780:                                        proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  781:                                        transport_opts(Type, Config),
  782:                                        proplists:get_value(node, Config),
  783:                                        http_request("GET /index.html/foo.html ", Version, Host),
  784:                                        [{statuscode, 404},
  785:                                         {version, Version}]).

  787: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  788: chunked_post() ->
  789:     [{doc,"Test option max_client_body_chunk"}].
  790: chunked_post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  791:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_chunked ",  
  792:                        {"Content-Length:833 \r\n",
  793:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  794:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  795:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  796:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  797:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  798:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  799:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  800:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  801:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  802:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  803:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  804:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  805:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  806:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  807:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  808:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  809:                         "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"},
  810:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} |Config], 
  811:                      [{statuscode, 200}]),
  812:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_chunked ",  
  813:                      {"Content-Length:2 \r\n",
  814:                         "ZZ"
  815:                      },
  816:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} |Config], 
  817:                      [{statuscode, 200}]).
  818: 
  819: chunked_chunked_encoded_post() ->
  820:     [{doc,"Test option max_client_body_chunk with chunked client encoding"}].
  821: chunked_chunked_encoded_post(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  822:     Chunk = http_chunk:encode("ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"),
  823:     LastChunk = http_chunk:encode_last(),
  824:     Chunks = lists:duplicate(10000, Chunk),
  825:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_chunked ",  
  826:                      {"Transfer-Encoding:chunked \r\n",
  827:                       [Chunks | LastChunk]},
  828:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config], 
  829:                      [{statuscode, 200}]).
  830: 
  831: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  832: post_204() ->
  833:     [{doc,"Test that 204 responses are not chunk encoded"}].
  834: post_204(Config) ->
  835:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
  836:     Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
  837:     SockType = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
  838:     TranspOpts = transport_opts(SockType, Config),
  839:     Request = "POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post_204 ",
  840: 
  841:     try inets_test_lib:connect_bin(SockType, Host, Port, TranspOpts) of
  842: 	{ok, Socket} ->
  843:             RequestStr = http_request(Request, "HTTP/1.1", Host),
  844: 	    ok = inets_test_lib:send(SockType, Socket, RequestStr),
  845:             receive
  846:                 {tcp, Socket, Data} ->
  847:                     case binary:match(Data, <<"chunked">>,[]) of
  848:                         nomatch ->
  849:                             ok;
  850:                         {_, _} ->
  851:                             ct:fail("Chunked encoding detected.")
  852:                     end
  853:             after 2000 ->
  854:                     ct:fail(connection_timed_out)
  855:             end;
  856: 	ConnectError ->
  857: 	    ct:fail({connect_error, ConnectError,
  858: 		     [SockType, Host, Port, TranspOpts]})
  859:     catch
  860: 	T:E:Stk ->
  861: 	    ct:fail({connect_failure,
  862: 		     [{type,       T},
  863: 		      {error,      E},
  864: 		      {stacktrace, Stk},
  865: 		      {args,       [SockType, Host, Port, TranspOpts]}]})
  866:     end.
  867: 
  868: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  869: host() ->
  870:     [{doc, "Test host header"}].
  871: 
  872: host(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  873:     Cb = proplists:get_value(version_cb, Config),
  874:     Cb:host(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
  875: 	    proplists:get_value(host, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config)).
  876: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  877: chunked() ->
  878:     [{doc, "Check that the server accepts chunked requests."}].
  879: 
  880: chunked(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  881:     httpd_1_1:chunked(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
  882: 		      proplists:get_value(host, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config)).
  883: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  884: expect() ->   
  885:     ["Check that the server handles request with the expect header "
  886:      "field appropriate"].
  887: expect(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  888:     httpd_1_1:expect(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
  889: 		     proplists:get_value(host, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config)).
  890: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  891: max_clients_1_1() ->
  892:     [{doc, "Test max clients limit"}].
  893: 
  894: max_clients_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  895:     do_max_clients([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
  896: 
  897: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  898: put_not_sup() ->
  899:     [{doc, "Test unhandled request"}].
  900: 
  901: put_not_sup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  902:     ok = http_status("PUT /index.html ",
  903:                      {"Content-Length:100 \r\n",
  904:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  905:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  906:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  907:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  908:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  909:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  910:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  911:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  912:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  913:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  914:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  915:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  916:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  917:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  918:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  919:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
  920:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"},
  921: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 501}]).
  922: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  923: esi() ->
  924:     [{doc, "Test mod_esi"}].
  925: 
  926: esi(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  927:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example ", 
  928: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 400}]),
  929:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ",
  930: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  931:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:"
  932: 		     "get?input=4711 ", Config,
  933: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
  934:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:post ",
  935: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
  936:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/not_allowed:post ",
  937: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 403}]),
  938:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:undef ",
  939: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 404}]),
  940:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example/yahoo ",
  941: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 302}]),
  942:     %% Check "ErlScriptNoCache" directive (default: false)
  943:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ",
  944: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 200},
  945: 		      {no_header, "cache-control"}]),
  946:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:peer ",
  947: 	  	     Config, [{statuscode, 200},
  948:                               {header, "peer-cert-exist", peer(Config)}]),
  949:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:new_status_and_location ",
  950:                      Config, [{statuscode, 201},
  951:                               {header, "location"}]).
  952:

  974:     Chunk = "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ",
  975:     Data = lists:duplicate(10000, Chunk),
  976:     Length = lists:flatlength(Data),
  977:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example/post ",
  978:                      {"Content-Length:" ++ integer_to_list(Length) ++ "\r\n",
  979:                       Data},
  980:                      [{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} |Config], 
  981:                      [{statuscode, 200}]).

  989: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  990: esi_proagate(Config)  when is_list(Config) -> 
  991:     register(propagate_test, self()),
  992:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:new_status_and_location ",
  993:                   Config, [{statuscode, 201}]),
  994:     receive
  995:         {status, 201} ->
  996:             ok;
  997:         Err ->
  998:             ct:fail(Err)
  999:     end.        
 1000: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1001: esi_atom_leak() ->
 1002:     [{doc, "Test mod_esi for atom leakage - verify module, function names and HTTP headers"}].
 1003: 
 1004: esi_atom_leak(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1005:     NumberStrings = [integer_to_list(N) || N <- lists:seq(1, 10)],
 1006: 
 1007:     NotExistingModule =
 1008:         ["GET /cgi-bin/erl/not_existing_" ++ S ++":get " || S <- NumberStrings],
 1009:     %% check atom count after first HTTP call, to ignore count increase upon initial module loading
 1010:     GetFun = fun(Url, HeadersAndBody, Expected) ->
 1011:                      ok = http_status(Url, HeadersAndBody, Config, Expected),
 1012:                      erlang:system_info(atom_count)
 1013:              end,
 1014:     AtomCount1 = [GetFun(U, {"", ""}, [{statuscode, 404}]) || U <- NotExistingModule],
 1015:     IsStable = fun(L) -> lists:max(L) == lists:min(L) end,
 1016:     true = IsStable(AtomCount1),
 1017: 
 1018:     NotExistingFunction =
 1019:         ["GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:not_existing" ++ S ++ " "
 1020:          || S <- NumberStrings],
 1021:     AtomCount2 = [GetFun(U, {"", ""}, [{statuscode, 404}]) || U <- NotExistingFunction],
 1022:     true = IsStable(AtomCount2),
 1023: 
 1024:     NotExistingHdr =
 1025:         [{"NotExistingHeader_" ++ S ++ ":100 \r\n", ""} || S <- NumberStrings],
 1026:     AtomCount3 = [GetFun("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ", H, [{statuscode, 200}])
 1027:                   || H <- NotExistingHdr],
 1028:     true = IsStable(AtomCount3).
 1029: 
 1030: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1031: esi_headers() ->
 1032:     [{doc, "Test mod_esi HTTP headers support"}].
 1033: 
 1034: esi_headers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1035:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get_reply_headers ",
 1036:                      {"Accept-Encoding: gzip \r\nNotExistingHeader_1: 100 \r\n", ""},
 1037:                      Config, [{statuscode, 200}, {header, "notexistingheader_1", "100"},
 1038:                               {header, "accept-encoding", "gzip"}]).
 1039: 
 1040: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1041: cgi() ->
 1042:     [{doc, "Test mod_cgi"}].
 1043: 
 1044: cgi(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1045:     {Script, Script2, Script3} =
 1046: 	case os:type() of
 1047: 	    {win32, _} ->
 1048: 		{"printenv.bat", "printenv.sh", "cgi_echo.exe"};
 1049: 	    _ ->
 1050: 		{"printenv.sh", "printenv.bat", "cgi_echo"}
 1051: 	end,
 1052: 
 1053:      %%The length (> 100) is intentional
 1054:      ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/" ++ Script3 ++ " ", 
 1055:      		     {"Content-Length:100 \r\n",
 1056:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1057:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1058:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1059:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1060:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1061:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1062:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1063:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1064:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1065:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1066:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1067:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1068:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1069:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1070:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1071:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"
 1072:      		      "ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ"}, 
 1073: 		      Config,
 1074:      		     [{statuscode, 200},
 1075:      		      {header, "content-type", "text/plain"}]),
 1076:     
 1077:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/"++ Script ++ " ", Config, [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1078: 
 1079:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/not_there ", Config, 
 1080: 		     [{statuscode, 404}, {statuscode, 500}]),
 1081:     
 1082:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/"++ Script ++ "?Nisse:kkk?sss/lll ", 
 1083:      		     Config,
 1084:      		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1085:     
 1086:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/"++ Script  ++ " ", Config,
 1087: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1088:     
 1089:     ok = http_status("GET /htbin/"++ Script ++ " ",  Config,
 1090: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1091:     
 1092:     ok = http_status("GET /htbin/not_there ", Config,
 1093: 		     [{statuscode, 404},{statuscode, 500}]),
 1094:     
 1095:     ok = http_status("GET /htbin/"++ Script ++ "?Nisse:kkk?sss/lll ", Config, 
 1096:      		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1097:     
 1098:     ok = http_status("POST /htbin/"++ Script ++ " ",   Config,
 1099: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1100:     
 1101:     ok = http_status("POST /htbin/"++ Script ++ " ",  Config,
 1102: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1103:     
 1104:     %% Execute an existing, but bad CGI script..
 1105:     ok = http_status("POST /htbin/"++ Script2 ++ " ",  Config, 
 1106: 		     [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1107:     
 1108:     ok = http_status("POST /cgi-bin/"++ Script2 ++ " ", Config,
 1109: 		     [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1110:     
 1111:     %% Check "ScriptNoCache" directive (default: false)
 1112:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/" ++ Script ++ " ", Config,
 1113: 		     [{statuscode, 200},
 1114: 		      {no_header, "cache-control"}]).
 1115: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1116: cgi_chunked_encoding_test() ->  
 1117:     [{doc, "Test chunked encoding together with mod_cgi "}].
 1118: cgi_chunked_encoding_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1119:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1120:     Script =
 1121: 	case os:type() of
 1122: 	    {win32, _} ->
 1123: 		"/cgi-bin/printenv.bat";
 1124: 	    _ ->
 1125: 		"/cgi-bin/printenv.sh"
 1126: 	end,
 1127:     Requests = 
 1128: 	["GET " ++ Script ++ " HTTP/1.1\r\nHost:"++ Host ++"\r\n\r\n",
 1129: 	 "GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example/newformat  HTTP/1.1\r\nHost:"
 1130: 	 ++ Host ++"\r\n\r\n"],
 1131:     httpd_1_1:mod_cgi_chunked_encoding_test(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1132: 					    Host,
 1133: 					    proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1134: 					    Requests).

 1136: alias_1_1() ->
 1137:     [{doc, "Test mod_alias"}].
 1138: 
 1139: alias_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1140:     alias([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1141: 
 1142: alias_1_0() ->
 1143:     [{doc, "Test mod_alias"}].
 1144:   
 1145: alias_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1146:     alias([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1147: 
 1148: alias() ->
 1149:     [{doc, "Test mod_alias"}].
 1150: 
 1151: alias(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1152:     TestURIs200 = [
 1153:                    {"GET /pics/icon.sheet.gif ", 200, "image/gif"},
 1154:                    {"GET / ", 200, "text/html"},
 1155:                    {"GET /misc/ ", 200, "text/html"}
 1156:                   ],
 1157:     Test200 =
 1158:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType}) ->
 1159:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s",
 1160:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType]),
 1161:                 ok = http_status(Request, Config,
 1162:                                  [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1163:                                   {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1164:                                   {header, "Server"},
 1165:                                   {header, "Date"}])
 1166:         end,
 1167:     [Test200(T) || T <- TestURIs200],
 1168:     TestURIs301 =
 1169:         [
 1170:          %% Check redirection if trailing slash is missing.
 1171:          {"GET /misc ", 301, "text/html", "&#47;misc&#47;$"},
 1172:          %% slash character expected after path(misc) not query component
 1173:          {"GET /misc?test=test ", 301, "text/html", "&#47;misc&#47;\\?test=test$"}
 1174:         ],
 1175:     Test301 =
 1176:         fun({Request, ResultCode, ContentType, TargetLinkRegexp}) ->
 1177:                 ct:log("Request: ~s Expecting: ~p ~s RE: ~s",
 1178:                      [Request, ResultCode, ContentType, TargetLinkRegexp]),
 1179:                 {ok, [RedirectLink]} =
 1180:                     http_status(Request, Config,
 1181:                                 [{statuscode, ResultCode},
 1182:                                  {header, "Content-Type", ContentType},
 1183:                                  {header, "Server"},
 1184:                                  {header, "Date"},
 1185:                                  {fetch_hrefs, true}]),
 1186:                 ReResult = re:run(RedirectLink, TargetLinkRegexp),
 1187:                 ct:log("RedirectLink = ~p", [RedirectLink]),
 1188:                 ?assertMatch({match, _}, ReResult)
 1189:               end,
 1190:     [Test301(T) || T <- TestURIs301],
 1191:     ok.
 1192:

 1244: content_length() ->
 1245:     ["Tests that content-length is correct OTP-5775"].
 1246: content_length(Config) ->
 1247:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1248:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1249:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host,
 1250: 				       proplists:get_value(port, Config), proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1251: 				       http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get_bin ", 
 1252: 						    Version, Host), 
 1253: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 1254: 					{content_length, 274},
 1255: 					{version, Version}]).

 1258:     ["Tests that a URI with a bad hexadecimal code is handled OTP-6003"].

 1264: 				       http_request("GET http://www.erlang.org/%skalle ",
 1265: 						    Version, Host),
 1266: 				       [{statuscode, 400},
 1267: 					{version, Version}]).

 1317: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1318: max_header() ->
 1319:     ["Denial Of Service (DOS) attack, prevented by max_header"].
 1320: max_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1321:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1322:     Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1323:     case Version of
 1324:  	"HTTP/0.9" ->
 1325:  	    {skip, not_implemented};
 1326:  	_ ->
 1327:  	    dos_hostname(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), Host, 
 1328:  			 proplists:get_value(node, Config), Version, ?MAX_HEADER_SIZE)
 1329:     end.
 1330: 
 1331: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1332: max_content_length() ->
 1333:     ["Denial Of Service (DOS) attack, prevented by max_content_length"].
 1334: max_content_length(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1335:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1336:     Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1337:     garbage_content_length(proplists:get_value(type, Config), proplists:get_value(port, Config), Host, 
 1338: 			   proplists:get_value(node, Config), Version).
 1339: 
 1340: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1341: ignore_invalid_header() ->
 1342:     ["RFC 7230 - 3.2.4 ... No whitespace is allowed between the header field-name and colon"].
 1343: ignore_invalid_header(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1344:      Host =  proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1345:      Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1346:     {Url, Header, Opts} =
 1347:         case proplists:get_value(type, Config) of
 1348:             ip_comm ->
 1349:                 {"http://"  ++ Host ++  ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:ignore_invalid_header",
 1350:                  [{"Host", "localhost"},{"Te", ""}, {"Content-Length ", "0"}], []};
 1351:             ssl ->
 1352:                 Conf = proplists:get_value(client_config, proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config)),
 1353:                 {"https://"  ++ Host ++  ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "/cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:ignore_invalid_header",
 1354:                  [{"Host", "localhost"},{"Te", ""}, {"Content-Length ", "0"}], [{ssl, Conf}]}
 1355:         end,
 1356:     {ok,{{_,204,_}, _, _}}
 1357:         = httpc:request(get, {Url, Header}, [{timeout, 45000} | Opts], [{headers_as_is, true}]).
 1358: 
 1359: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1360: security_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1361:     security([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1362: 
 1363: security_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1364:     security([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1365: 
 1366: security() ->
 1367:     ["Test mod_security"].
 1368: security(Config) ->
 1369:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1370:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1371:     Port =  proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1372:     Node = proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1373:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 1374: 
 1375:     global:register_name(mod_security_test, self()),   % Receive events
 1376: 
 1377:     ct:sleep(5000),
 1378: 
 1379:     OpenDir = filename:join([ServerRoot, "htdocs", "open"]),
 1380: 
 1381:     %% Test blocking / unblocking of users.
 1382: 
 1383:     %% /open, require user one Aladdin
 1384:     remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, "", "open"),
 1385: 
 1386:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/",
 1387:      				  "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config,
 1388: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1389:     
 1390:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1391: 			    [{user, "one"}, {password, "onePassword"}]},
 1392: 			   Node, Port),
 1393:     
 1394:      ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/",
 1395: 				  "two", "twoPassword", Version, Host), Config, 
 1396: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1397:  
 1398:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1399: 			    [{user, "two"}, {password, "twoPassword"}]},
 1400: 			   Node, Port),
 1401: 
 1402:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", 
 1403: 				  "Aladdin", "AladdinPassword", Version, Host),
 1404: 		     Config, [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1405:     
 1406:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1407: 			    [{user, "Aladdin"},
 1408: 			     {password, "AladdinPassword"}]},
 1409: 			   Node, Port),
 1410: 
 1411:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, "", "open", "one", "onePassword", []),
 1412:     add_user(Node, ServerRoot, Port, "", "open", "two", "twoPassword", []),
 1413: 
 1414:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1415: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1416:     
 1417:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1418: 			    [{user, "one"}, {password, "WrongPassword"}]},
 1419: 			   Node, Port),
 1420: 
 1421:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1422: 				  [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1423:     
 1424:     receive_security_event({event, auth_fail, Port, OpenDir,
 1425: 			    [{user, "one"}, {password, "WrongPassword"}]},
 1426: 			   Node, Port),
 1427:     receive_security_event({event, user_block, Port, OpenDir,
 1428: 			    [{user, "one"}]}, Node, Port),
 1429:     
 1430:     global:unregister_name(mod_security_test),   % No more events.
 1431:     
 1432:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "WrongPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1433: 				  [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1434:     
 1435:     %% User "one" should be blocked now..    
 1436:     case list_blocked_users(Node, Port) of
 1437: 	[{"one",_, Port, OpenDir,_}] ->
 1438: 	    ok;
 1439: 	Blocked ->
 1440: 	    ct:fail({unexpected_blocked, Blocked})
 1441:     end,
 1442: 
 1443:     [{"one",_, Port, OpenDir,_}] = list_blocked_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1444: 
 1445:     true = unblock_user(Node, "one", Port, OpenDir),
 1446:     %% User "one" should not be blocked any more.
 1447: 
 1448:     [] = list_blocked_users(Node, Port),
 1449: 
 1450:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "one", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config, 
 1451: 		     [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1452: 
 1453:     %% Test list_auth_users & auth_timeout
 1454: 
 1455:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1456: 
 1457:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "two", "onePassword", Version, Host), Config, 
 1458: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1459: 
 1460:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1461: 
 1462:    
 1463:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1464: 
 1465:    
 1466:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "two", "twoPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1467: 				  [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1468: 
 1469:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1470: 
 1471:   
 1472:     ["one"] = list_auth_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1473: 
 1474:     %% Wait for successful auth to timeout.
 1475:     ct:sleep(?AUTH_TIMEOUT*1001),  
 1476: 
 1477:     [] = list_auth_users(Node, Port),
 1478: 
 1479:     [] = list_auth_users(Node, Port, OpenDir),
 1480: 
 1481:     %% "two" is blocked.
 1482: 
 1483:     true = unblock_user(Node, "two", Port, OpenDir),
 1484: 
 1485: 
 1486:     %% Test explicit blocking. Block user 'two'.
 1487: 
 1488:     [] = list_blocked_users(Node,Port,OpenDir),
 1489: 
 1490:     true = block_user(Node, "two", Port, OpenDir, 10),
 1491: 
 1492:     ok = auth_status(auth_request("/open/", "two", "twoPassword",  Version, Host), Config, 
 1493: 		     [{statuscode, 401}]),
 1494:     
 1495:     true = unblock_user(Node, "two", Port, OpenDir).
 1496: 
 1497: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1498: 
 1499: disk_log_internal() ->
 1500:     ["Test mod_disk_log"].
 1501: 
 1502: disk_log_internal(Config) ->
 1503:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1504:     Request = "GET /" ++ integer_to_list(rand:uniform(1000000)) ++ " ",
 1505:     ok = http_status(Request, Config, [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1506:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1507:     Match = list_to_binary(Request ++ Version),
 1508:     disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, disk_log:chunk(Log, start)).
 1509: disk_log_internal1(_, _, eof) ->
 1510:     ct:fail(eof);
 1511: disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, {Cont, [H | T]}) ->
 1512:     case binary:match(H, Match) of
 1513:         nomatch ->
 1514:             disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, {Cont, T});
 1515:         _ ->
 1516:             ok
 1517:     end;
 1518: disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, {Cont, []}) ->
 1519:     disk_log_internal1(Log, Match, disk_log:chunk(Log, Cont)).
 1520: 
 1521: disk_log_exists() ->
 1522:     ["Test mod_disk_log with existing logs"].
 1523: 
 1524: disk_log_exists(Config) ->
 1525:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1526:     Self = self(),
 1527:     Node = node(),
 1528:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1529:     {_, [{bogus, Node, Self} | _]} = disk_log:chunk(Log, start).
 1530: 
 1531: disk_log_bad_size() ->
 1532:     ["Test mod_disk_log with existing log, missing .siz"].
 1533: 
 1534: disk_log_bad_size(Config) ->
 1535:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1536:     Self = self(),
 1537:     Node = node(),
 1538:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1539:     {_, [{bogus, Node, Self} | _]} = disk_log:chunk(Log, start).
 1540: 
 1541: disk_log_bad_file() ->
 1542:     ["Test mod_disk_log with bad file"].
 1543: 
 1544: disk_log_bad_file(Config) ->
 1545:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1546:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1547:     Request = "GET /" ++ integer_to_list(rand:uniform(1000000)) ++ " ",
 1548:     ok = http_status(Request, Config, [{statuscode, 404}]),
 1549:     Log = proplists:get_value(transfer_log, Config),
 1550:     Match = list_to_binary(Request ++ Version),
 1551:     {_, [H | _]} = disk_log:chunk(Log, start),
 1552:     {_, _} = binary:match(H, Match).
 1553: 
 1554: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1555: non_disturbing_reconfiger_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1556:     do_reconfiger_dies([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config], non_disturbing).
 1557: disturbing_reconfiger_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1558:     do_reconfiger_dies([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config], disturbing).
 1559: 
 1560: do_reconfiger_dies(Config, DisturbingType) ->
 1561:     Server =  proplists:get_value(server_pid, Config),
 1562:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1563:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1564:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1565:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1566: 
 1567:     HttpdConfig = httpd:info(Server), 
 1568:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version, Host),
 1569:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1570:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1571:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1572:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> httpd:reload_config([{server_name, "httpd_kill_" ++ Version}, 
 1573:                                               {port, Port}|
 1574:                                               proplists:delete(server_name, HttpdConfig)], DisturbingType) 
 1575:                 end),
 1576:     
 1577:     monitor(process, Pid),
 1578:     exit(Pid, kill),
 1579:     receive 
 1580:         {'DOWN', _, _, _, _} ->
 1581:             ok
 1582:     end,
 1583:     inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1584:     [{server_name, "httpd_test"}] =  httpd:info(Server, [server_name]).
 1585: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1586: disturbing_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1587:     disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1588: 
 1589: disturbing_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1590:     disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1591: 
 1592: disturbing(Config) when is_list(Config)->
 1593:     LogWatcher = start_log_watcher(),
 1594:     Server =  proplists:get_value(server_pid, Config),
 1595:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1596:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1597:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1598:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1599:     HttpdConfig = httpd:info(Server), 
 1600: 
 1601:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version,  Host),
 1602:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1603:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1604:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1605:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{server_name, "httpd_disturbing_" ++ Version}, {port, Port}|
 1606: 			      proplists:delete(server_name, HttpdConfig)], disturbing),
 1607:     Close = list_to_atom((typestr(Type)) ++ "_closed"),
 1608:     receive 
 1609: 	{Close, Socket} ->
 1610:             inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1611:             [{server_name, "httpd_disturbing_" ++ Version}] =
 1612:                 httpd:info(Server, [server_name]),
 1613:             [] = stop_log_watcher(LogWatcher),
 1614:             [] = inets_test_lib:flush(),
 1615: 	    ok
 1616:     end.
 1617: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1618: non_disturbing_1_1(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1619:     non_disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.1"} | Config]).
 1620: 
 1621: non_disturbing_1_0(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
 1622:     non_disturbing([{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"} | Config]).
 1623: 
 1624: non_disturbing(Config) when is_list(Config)->
 1625:     Server =  proplists:get_value(server_pid, Config),
 1626:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1627:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1628:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1629:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1630: 
 1631:     HttpdConfig = httpd:info(Server), 
 1632:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version, Host),
 1633:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1634:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1635:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1636:     ok = httpd:reload_config([{server_name, "httpd_non_disturbing_" ++ Version}, {port, Port}|
 1637: 			      proplists:delete(server_name, HttpdConfig)], non_disturbing),
 1638:     Transport = type(Type),
 1639:     receive 
 1640: 	{Transport, Socket, Msg} ->
 1641: 	    ct:pal("Received message ~p~n", [Msg]),
 1642: 	    ok
 1643:     after 2000 ->
 1644: 	  ct:fail(timeout)  
 1645:     end,
 1646:     inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1647:     [{server_name, "httpd_non_disturbing_" ++ Version}] =  httpd:info(Server, [server_name]).
 1648: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1649: reload_config_file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1650:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 1651:     HttpdConf = filename:join(get_tmp_dir(Config), "inets_httpd_server.conf"),
 1652:     ServerConfig =
 1653:         "[\n" ++
 1654:         "{bind_address, \"localhost\"}," ++
 1655:         "{port,0}," ++
 1656:         "{server_name,\"httpd_test\"}," ++
 1657:         "{server_root,\"" ++ ServerRoot ++  "\"}," ++
 1658:         "{document_root,\"" ++ proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config) ++ "\"}" ++
 1659:         "].",
 1660:     ok = file:write_file(HttpdConf, ServerConfig),
 1661:     {ok, Server} = inets:start(httpd, [{proplist_file, HttpdConf}]),
 1662:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, httpd:info(Server)),
 1663:     NewConfig =
 1664:         "[\n" ++
 1665:         "{bind_address, \"localhost\"}," ++
 1666:         "{port," ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ "}," ++
 1667:         "{server_name,\"httpd_test_new\"}," ++
 1668:         "{server_root,\"" ++ ServerRoot ++  "\"}," ++
 1669:         "{document_root,\"" ++ proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config) ++ "\"}" ++
 1670:         "].",
 1671:     
 1672:     %% Test Erlang term format
 1673:     ok = file:write_file(HttpdConf, NewConfig),
 1674:     ok = httpd:reload_config(HttpdConf, non_disturbing),
 1675:     "httpd_test_new" = proplists:get_value(server_name, httpd:info(Server)).
 1676: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------------

 1680:     {ok,[{"wrl","x-world/x-vrml"},
