 1786: erl_script_timeout_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1787:     inets:start(),
 1788:     {ok, Pid} =	inets:start(httpd,
 1789:                             [{port, 0},
 1790:                              {server_name,"localhost"},
 1791:                              {server_root,"./"},
 1792:                              {document_root,"./"},
 1793:                              {bind_address, any},
 1794:                              {mimetypes, [{"html", "text/html"}]},
 1795:                              {modules,[mod_esi]},
 1796:                              {erl_script_alias, {"/erl", [httpd_example]}}
 1797:                             ]),
 1798:     Info = httpd:info(Pid),
 1799: 
 1800:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Info),
 1801: 
 1802:     %% Default erl_script_timeout is 15.
 1803:     %% Verify:  13 =< erl_script_timeout =< 17
 1804:     Url = http_get_url(Port, 500, 13000, 4000),
 1805: 
 1806:     {ok, {_, _, Body}} = httpc:request(get, {Url, []}, [{timeout, 45000}], []),
 1807:     ct:log("Response: ~p~n", [Body]),
 1808:     verify_body(Body, 13000),
 1809:     inets:stop().
 1810: 
 1811: erl_script_timeout_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1812:     inets:start(),
 1813:     {ok, Pid} =	inets:start(httpd,
 1814:                             [{port, 0},
 1815:                              {server_name,"localhost"},
 1816:                              {server_root,"./"},
 1817:                              {document_root,"./"},
 1818:                              {bind_address, any},
 1819:                              {mimetypes, [{"html", "text/html"}]},
 1820:                              {modules,[mod_esi]},
 1821:                              {erl_script_timeout, 2},
 1822:                              {erl_script_alias, {"/erl", [httpd_example]}}
 1823:                             ]),
 1824:     Info = httpd:info(Pid),
 1825:     verify_timeout(Info, 2),
 1826: 
 1827:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Info),
 1828: 
 1829:     %% Verify:  1 =< erl_script_timeout =< 3
 1830:     Url = http_get_url(Port, 500, 1000, 2000),
 1831: 
 1832:     {ok, {_, _, Body}} = httpc:request(Url),
 1833:     ct:log("Response: ~p~n", [Body]),
 1834:     verify_body(Body, 1000),
 1835:     inets:stop().
 1836: 
 1837: erl_script_timeout_proplist(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1838:     HttpdConf = filename:join(get_tmp_dir(Config),
 1839:                               "httpd_erl_script_timeout_proplist.conf"),
 1840:     ServerConfig =
 1841:         "[{port, 0},\n" ++
 1842:         " {server_name,\"localhost\"},\n" ++
 1843:         " {server_root,\"./\"},\n" ++
 1844:         " {document_root,\"./\"},\n" ++
 1845:         " {bind_address, any},\n" ++
 1846:         " {mimetypes, [{\"html\", \"text/html\"}]},\n" ++
 1847:         " {modules,[mod_esi]},\n" ++
 1848:         " {erl_script_timeout, 5},\n" ++
 1849:         " {erl_script_alias, {\"/erl\", [httpd_example]}}\n" ++
 1850:         "].",
 1851:     ok = file:write_file(HttpdConf, ServerConfig),
 1852: 
 1853:     inets:start(),
 1854:     {ok, Pid} =	inets:start(httpd,
 1855:                             [{proplist_file, HttpdConf}]),
 1856:     Info = httpd:info(Pid),
 1857:     verify_timeout(Info, 5),
 1858: 
 1859:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Info),
 1860: 
 1861:     %% Verify:  3 =< erl_script_timeout =< 7
 1862:     Url = http_get_url(Port, 500, 3000, 4000),
 1863: 
 1864:     {ok, {_, _, Body}} = httpc:request(Url),
 1865:     ct:log("Response: ~p~n", [Body]),
 1866:     verify_body(Body, 3000),
 1867:     inets:stop().
 1868: 
 1869: erl_script_alias_all(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
 1870:     ok = start_apps(http_basic),
 1871:     Config1 = [{http_version, "HTTP/1.0"},
 1872:                {type, ip_comm} |
 1873:                Config0],
 1874:     Config2 = init_httpd(http_basic_erl_script_alias_all, Config1),
 1875:     ok = http_status("GET /cgi-bin/erl/httpd_example:get ",
 1876:         	     Config2, [{statuscode, 200}]),
 1877:     inets:stop().
 1878: 
 1879: tls_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1880:     SSLOpts = proplists:get_value(client_alert_conf, Config),    
 1881:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),    
 1882:     {error, {tls_alert, _}} = ssl:connect("localhost", Port, [{verify, verify_peer} | SSLOpts]).
 1883: 
 1884: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1885: %% Internal functions -----------------------------------
 1886: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1887: url(http, End, Config) ->
 1888:     Port = proplists:get_value(port, Config),
 1889:     {ok,Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1890:     ?URL_START ++ Host ++ ":" ++ integer_to_list(Port) ++ End.
 1891: 
 1892: http_get_url(Port0, HeaderDelay, ChunkDelay, BadChunkDelay) ->
 1893:     {ok, Host} = inet:gethostname(),
 1894:     Port = integer_to_list(Port0),
 1895:     HD = integer_to_list(HeaderDelay),
 1896:     CD = integer_to_list(ChunkDelay),
 1897:     BD = integer_to_list(BadChunkDelay),
 1898:     "http://" ++ Host ++ ":" ++ Port ++
 1899:         "/erl/httpd_example/get_chunks?header_delay=" ++ HD ++
 1900:         "&chunk_delay=" ++ CD ++
 1901:         "&bad_chunk_delay=" ++ BD.
 1902: 
 1903: verify_body(Body, Timeout0) ->
 1904:     Timeout = integer_to_list(Timeout0),
 1905:     Res = string:find(Body, Timeout),
 1906:     ct:log("Result: ~p~n", [Res]),
 1907:     %% Fail if BAD chunk is found.
 1908:     case Res =:= Timeout ++ " ms\r\n" of
 1909:         true ->
 1910:             ok;
 1911:         false ->
 1912:             ct:fail("Unexpected chunk received!")
 1913:     end.
 1914: 
 1915: verify_timeout(Info, Expected) ->
 1916:     Timeout = proplists:get_value(erl_script_timeout, Info),
 1917:     case Timeout =:= Expected of
 1918:         true ->
 1919:             ok;
 1920:         false ->
 1921:             ct:fail("Bad Timeout - Expected: ~p Got: ~p", [Expected, Timeout])
 1922:     end.
 1923: 
 1924: do_max_clients(Config) ->
 1925:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 1926:     Host    = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 1927:     Port    = proplists:get_value(port, Config), 
 1928:     Type    = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 1929:     
 1930:     Request = http_request("GET /index.html ", Version, Host),
 1931:     BlockRequest = http_request("GET /cgi_bin/erl/httpd_example:delay ", Version, Host),
 1932:     {ok, Socket} = inets_test_lib:connect_bin(Type, Host, Port, transport_opts(Type, Config)),
 1933:     inets_test_lib:send(Type, Socket, BlockRequest),
 1934:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, 
 1935: 				       Port,
 1936: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
 1937: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1938: 				       Request,
 1939: 				       [{statuscode, 503},
 1940: 					{version, Version}]),
 1941:     receive 
 1942: 	{_, Socket, _Msg} ->
 1943: 	    ok
 1944:     end,
 1945:     inets_test_lib:close(Type, Socket),
 1946:     ct:sleep(100), %% Avoid possible timing issues
 1947:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, 
 1948: 				       Port,
 1949: 				       transport_opts(Type, Config),
 1950: 				       proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 1951: 				       Request,
 1952: 				       [{statuscode, 200},
 1953: 					{version, Version}]).
 1954: 
 1955: setup_server_dirs(ServerRoot, DocRoot, DataDir) ->   
 1956:     CgiDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin"),
 1957:     AuthDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "auth"),
 1958:     PicsDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "icons"),
 1959:     ConfigDir =  filename:join(ServerRoot, "config"),
 1960: 
 1961:     ok = file:make_dir(ServerRoot),
 1962:     ok = file:make_dir(DocRoot),
 1963:     ok = file:make_dir(CgiDir),
 1964:     ok = file:make_dir(AuthDir),
 1965:     ok = file:make_dir(PicsDir),
 1966:     ok = file:make_dir(ConfigDir),
 1967: 
 1968:     DocSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/htdocs"),    
 1969:     AuthSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/auth"),    
 1970:     CgiSrc =  filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/cgi-bin"),    
 1971:     PicsSrc =  filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/icons"),    
 1972:     ConfigSrc = filename:join(DataDir, "server_root/config"),
 1973:     
 1974:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(DocSrc, DocRoot),
 1975:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(AuthSrc, AuthDir),
 1976:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(CgiSrc, CgiDir),
 1977:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(PicsSrc, PicsDir),
 1978:     inets_test_lib:copy_dirs(ConfigSrc, ConfigDir),
 1979:         
 1980:     Cgi = case os:type() of
 1981: 	      {win32, _} ->
 1982: 		  "cgi_echo.exe";
 1983: 	      _ ->
 1984: 		  "cgi_echo"
 1985: 	  end,
 1986:     
 1987:     inets_test_lib:copy_file(Cgi, DataDir, CgiDir),
 1988:     AbsCgi = filename:join([CgiDir, Cgi]),
 1989:     {ok, FileInfo} = file:read_file_info(AbsCgi),
 1990:     ok = file:write_file_info(AbsCgi, FileInfo#file_info{mode = 8#00755}),
 1991:     
 1992:     EnvCGI =  filename:join([ServerRoot, "cgi-bin", "printenv.sh"]),
 1993:     {ok, FileInfo1} = file:read_file_info(EnvCGI),
 1994:     ok = file:write_file_info(EnvCGI, 
 1995: 			      FileInfo1#file_info{mode = 8#00755}).
 1996: 
 1997: setup_tmp_dir(PrivDir) ->
 1998:     TmpDir =  filename:join(PrivDir, "tmp"),
 1999:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir).
 2000: 
 2001: get_tmp_dir(Config) ->
 2002:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 2003:     filename:join(PrivDir, "tmp").
 2004: 
 2005: start_apps(Group) when  Group == https_basic;
 2006: 			Group == https_limit;
 2007: 			Group == https_custom;
 2008: 			Group == https_basic_auth;
 2009: 			Group == https_auth_api;
 2010: 			Group == https_auth_api_dets;
 2011: 			Group == https_auth_api_mnesia;
 2012: 			Group == https_security;
 2013: 			Group == https_reload;
 2014:                         Group == https_not_sup;
 2015:                         Group == https_alert
 2016: 			->
 2017:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets, asn1, crypto, public_key, ssl]);
 2018: start_apps(Group) when  Group == http_basic;
 2019: 			Group == http_limit;
 2020: 			Group == http_custom;
 2021: 			Group == http_basic_auth;
 2022: 			Group == http_auth_api;
 2023: 			Group == http_auth_api_dets;
 2024: 			Group == http_auth_api_mnesia;			
 2025: 			Group == http_security;
 2026: 			Group == http_logging;
 2027: 			Group == http_reload;
 2028:                         Group == http_post;
 2029:                         Group == http_mime_types;
 2030:                         Group == http_rel_path_script_alias;
 2031:                         Group == http_not_sup;
 2032:                         Group == http_mime_types->
 2033:     inets_test_lib:start_apps([inets]).
 2034: 
 2035: server_start(_, HttpdConfig) ->
 2036:     {ok, Pid} = inets:start(httpd, HttpdConfig),
 2037:     Serv = inets:services_info(),
 2038:     {value, {_, _, Info}} = lists:keysearch(Pid, 2, Serv),
 2039:     {Pid, proplists:get_value(port, Info)}.
 2040: 
 2041: init_ssl(Group, Config) ->
 2042:     ClientFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "client"]),
 2043:     ServerFileBase = filename:join([proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), "server"]),
 2044:     GenCertData = #{client_config := CConf} =
 2045:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 2046:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 2047:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
 2048:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
 2049:                                                   ]},
 2050:                                     client_chain => 
 2051:                                         #{root => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
 2052:                                           intermediates => [[{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
 2053:                                           peer => [{key, inets_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
 2054:     [_ | CAs] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, CConf),
 2055:     AlertConf = [{cacerts, CAs} |  proplists:delete(cacerts, CConf)],                 
 2056:     Conf = inets_test_lib:gen_pem_config_files(GenCertData, ClientFileBase, ServerFileBase),                               
 2057:     case start_apps(Group) of
 2058: 	ok ->
 2059: 	    init_httpd(Group, [{client_alert_conf, AlertConf}, {type, ssl}, {ssl_conf, Conf} | Config]);
 2060: 	_ ->
 2061: 	    {skip, "Could not start https apps"}
 2062:     end.
 2063: 
 2064: server_config(http_basic, Config) ->
 2065:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2066: server_config(http_basic_erl_script_alias_all, Config) ->
 2067:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(http_erl_script_alias_all, Config);
 2068: server_config(https_basic, Config) ->
 2069:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2070: server_config(http_not_sup, Config) ->
 2071:     not_sup_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2072: server_config(https_not_sup, Config) ->
 2073:     not_sup_conf() ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2074: server_config(http_reload, Config) ->
 2075:     [{keep_alive_timeout, 2}]  ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2076: server_config(http_post, Config) ->
 2077:     [{max_client_body_chunk, 10}]  ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2078: server_config(https_reload, Config) ->
 2079:     [{keep_alive_timeout, 2}]  ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2080: server_config(http_limit, Config) ->
 2081:     Conf = [{max_clients, 1},
 2082:             {disable_chunked_transfer_encoding_send, true},
 2083: 	    %% Make sure option checking code is run
 2084: 	    {max_content_length, 100000002}]  ++ server_config(http, Config),
 2085:     ct:pal("Received message ~p~n", [Conf]),
 2086:     Conf;
 2087: server_config(http_custom, Config) ->
 2088:     [{customize, ?MODULE}]  ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2089: server_config(https_custom, Config) ->
 2090:     [{customize, ?MODULE}]  ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2091: server_config(https_limit, Config) ->
 2092:     [{max_clients, 1},
 2093:      {disable_chunked_transfer_encoding_send, true}
 2094:     ]  ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2095: server_config(http_basic_auth, Config) ->
 2096:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2097:     auth_conf(ServerRoot)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2098: server_config(https_basic_auth, Config) ->
 2099:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2100:     auth_conf(ServerRoot)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2101: server_config(http_auth_api, Config) ->
 2102:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2103:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, plain)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2104: server_config(https_auth_api, Config) ->
 2105:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2106:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, plain)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2107: server_config(http_auth_api_dets, Config) ->
 2108:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2109:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, dets)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2110: server_config(https_auth_api_dets, Config) ->
 2111:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2112:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, dets)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2113: server_config(http_auth_api_mnesia, Config) ->
 2114:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2115:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, mnesia)  ++  server_config(http, Config);
 2116: server_config(https_auth_api_mnesia, Config) ->
 2117:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2118:     auth_api_conf(ServerRoot, mnesia)  ++  server_config(https, Config);
 2119: server_config(http_security, Config) ->
 2120:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2121:     tl(auth_conf(ServerRoot)) ++ security_conf(ServerRoot) ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2122: server_config(https_security, Config) ->
 2123:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2124:     tl(auth_conf(ServerRoot)) ++ security_conf(ServerRoot) ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2125: server_config(http_logging, Config) ->
 2126:     log_conf() ++ server_config(http, Config);
 2127: server_config(http_mime_types, Config0) ->
 2128:     Config1 = basic_conf() ++  server_config(http, Config0),
 2129:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config0),
 2130:     MimeTypesFile = filename:join([ServerRoot,"config", "mime.types"]),
 2131:     [{mime_types, MimeTypesFile} | proplists:delete(mime_types, Config1)];
 2132: server_config(https_alert, Config) ->
 2133:     basic_conf() ++ server_config(https, Config);
 2134: server_config(http, Config) ->
 2135:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2136:     config_template(Config, ServerRoot,
 2137:                     filename:join(ServerRoot, "cgi-bin") ++ "/", [httpd_example, io]);
 2138: server_config(http_erl_script_alias_all, Config) ->
 2139:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2140:     config_template(Config, ServerRoot, "./cgi-bin/", [all]);
 2141: server_config(http_rel_path_script_alias, Config) ->
 2142:     ServerRoot = proplists:get_value(server_root, Config),
 2143:     config_template(Config, ServerRoot, "./cgi-bin/", [httpd_example, io]);
 2144: server_config(https, Config) ->
 2145:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2146:     ServerConf = proplists:get_value(server_config, SSLConf),
 2147:     [{socket_type, {ssl,
 2148: 		    [{nodelay, true} | ServerConf]}}]
 2149:         ++ proplists:delete(socket_type, server_config(http, Config)).
 2150: 
 2151: config_template(Config, ServerRoot, ScriptPath, Modules) ->
 2152:     [{port, 0},
 2153:      {socket_type, {ip_comm, [{nodelay, true}]}},
 2154:      {server_name,"httpd_test"},
 2155:      {server_root, ServerRoot},
 2156:      {document_root, proplists:get_value(doc_root, Config)},
 2157:      {bind_address, any},
 2158:      {ipfamily, proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config)},
 2159:      {max_header_size, 256},
 2160:      {max_header_action, close},
 2161:      {directory_index, ["index.html", "welcome.html"]},
 2162:      {mime_types, [{"html","text/html"},{"htm","text/html"}, {"shtml","text/html"},
 2163: 		   {"gif", "image/gif"}]},
 2164:      {alias, {"/icons/", filename:join(ServerRoot,"icons") ++ "/"}},
 2165:      {alias, {"/pics/",  filename:join(ServerRoot,"icons") ++ "/"}},
 2166:      {script_alias, {"/cgi-bin/", ScriptPath}},
 2167:      {script_alias, {"/htbin/", ScriptPath}},
 2168:      {erl_script_alias, {"/cgi-bin/erl", Modules}}
 2169:     ].
 2170: 
 2171: init_httpd(Group, Config0) ->
 2172:     Config1 = proplists:delete(port, Config0),
 2173:     Config = proplists:delete(server_pid, Config1),
 2174:     {Pid, Port} = server_start(Group, server_config(Group, Config)),
 2175:     [{server_pid, Pid}, {port, Port} | Config].
 2176: 
 2177: http_request(Request, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host, {Headers, Body}) ->
 2178:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host ++ "\r\n" ++ Headers ++ "\r\n" ++ Body;
 2179: http_request(Request, Version, _, {Headers, Body}) ->
 2180:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\n" ++ Headers  ++ "\r\n" ++ Body.
 2181: 
 2182: http_request(Request, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2183:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++ "\r\n\r\n";
 2184: http_request(Request, Version, _) ->
 2185:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\n\r\n".
 2186: 
 2187: auth_request(Path, User, Passwd, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2188:     "GET " ++ Path ++ " " ++ Version ++  "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++
 2189: 	"\r\nAuthorization: Basic " ++  
 2190: 	base64:encode_to_string(User++":"++Passwd) ++
 2191: 	"\r\n\r\n";
 2192: auth_request(Path, User, Passwd, Version, _Host) ->
 2193:     "GET " ++ Path ++ " " ++ Version ++  
 2194: 	"\r\nAuthorization: Basic " ++  
 2195: 	base64:encode_to_string(User++":"++Passwd) ++
 2196: 	"\r\n\r\n".
 2197: 
 2198: http_request_missing_CR(Request, "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2199:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++ "\r\n\r\n\n";
 2200: http_request_missing_CR(Request, Version, _) ->
 2201:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\n\n".
 2202: 
 2203: head_status("HTTP/0.9", _) ->
 2204:     501; %% Not implemented in HTTP/0.9
 2205: head_status(_, Expected) ->
 2206:     Expected.
 2207: 
 2208: 
 2209: basic_conf() ->
 2210:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_range, mod_responsecontrol,
 2211: 		mod_trace, mod_esi, ?MODULE, mod_cgi, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2212:      {logger, [{error, httpd_test}]}].
 2213: 
 2214: do(ModData) ->
 2215:     case whereis(propagate_test) of
 2216:         undefined ->
 2217:             ok;
 2218:         _ ->
 2219:             {already_sent, Status, _Size} = proplists:get_value(response, ModData#mod.data),
 2220:             propagate_test ! {status, Status}              
 2221:     end,
 2222:     {proceed, ModData#mod.data}.
 2223: 
 2224: not_sup_conf() ->
 2225:     [{modules, [mod_get]}].
 2226: 
 2227: auth_access_conf() ->
 2228:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]}].
 2229: 
 2230: auth_conf(Root) ->
 2231:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2232:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/open"), 
 2233: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2234: 		   {auth_name, "Open Area"},
 2235: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2236: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2237: 		   {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]}]}},
 2238:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret"), 
 2239: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2240: 		   {auth_name, "Secret Area"},
 2241: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2242: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2243: 		   {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]}]}},
 2244:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret/top_secret"), 
 2245: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2246: 		   {auth_name, "Top Secret Area"},
 2247: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2248: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2249: 		   {require_group, ["group3"]}]}}].     
 2250: 
 2251: auth_api_conf(Root, plain) ->
 2252:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2253:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/open"), 
 2254: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2255: 		   {auth_name, "Open Area"},
 2256: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2257: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2258: 		   {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]}]}},
 2259:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret"), 
 2260: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2261: 		   {auth_name, "Secret Area"},
 2262: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2263: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2264: 		   {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]}]}},
 2265:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret/top_secret"), 
 2266: 		  [{auth_type, plain},
 2267: 		   {auth_name, "Top Secret Area"},
 2268: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2269: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2270: 		   {require_group, ["group3"]}]}}];
 2271: 
 2272: auth_api_conf(Root, dets) ->
 2273:     [
 2274:      {modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2275:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/dets_open"), 
 2276: 		  [{auth_type, dets},
 2277: 		   {auth_name, "Dets Open Area"},
 2278: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "passwd")},
 2279: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "group")},
 2280: 		   {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]}]}},
 2281:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/dets_secret"), 
 2282: 		  [{auth_type, dets},
 2283: 		   {auth_name, "Dests Secret Area"},
 2284: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "passwd")},
 2285: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "group")},
 2286: 		  {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]}]}},
 2287:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/dets_secret/top_secret"), 
 2288: 		  [{auth_type, dets},
 2289: 		   {auth_name, "Dets Top Secret Area"},
 2290: 		   {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "passwd")},
 2291: 		   {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "group")},
 2292: 		   {require_group, ["group3"]}]}} 
 2293:     ];
 2294: 
 2295: auth_api_conf(Root, mnesia) ->
 2296:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2297:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/mnesia_open"), 
 2298: 		  [{auth_type, mnesia},
 2299: 		   {auth_name, "Mnesia Open Area"},
 2300: 		   {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]}]}},
 2301:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/mnesia_secret"), 
 2302: 		  [{auth_type, mnesia},
 2303: 		   {auth_name, "Mnesia Secret Area"},
 2304: 		   {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]}]}},
 2305:      {directory, {filename:join(Root, "htdocs/mnesia_secret/top_secret"), 
 2306: 		  [{auth_type, mnesia},
 2307: 		   {auth_name, "Mnesia Top Secret Area"},
 2308: 		   {require_group, ["group3"]}]}}].
 2309: 
 2310: security_conf(Root) ->
 2311:     SecFile = filename:join(Root, "security_data"),
 2312:     Open = filename:join(Root, "htdocs/open"),
 2313:     Secret = filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret"),
 2314:     TopSecret = filename:join(Root, "htdocs/secret/top_secret"), 
 2315: 	
 2316:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_auth, mod_security, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head]},
 2317:      {security_directory, {Open, 
 2318: 			   [{auth_name, "Open Area"},
 2319: 			    {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2320: 			    {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2321: 			    {require_user, ["one", "Aladdin"]} | 
 2322: 			    mod_security_conf(SecFile, Open)]}},
 2323:      {security_directory, {Secret, 
 2324: 			   [{auth_name, "Secret Area"},
 2325: 			    {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2326: 			    {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2327: 			    {require_group, ["group1", "group2"]} |
 2328: 			    mod_security_conf(SecFile, Secret)]}},
 2329:      {security_directory, {TopSecret,
 2330: 			   [{auth_name, "Top Secret Area"},
 2331: 			    {auth_user_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/passwd")},
 2332: 			    {auth_group_file, filename:join(Root, "auth/group")},
 2333: 			    {require_group, ["group3"]} |
 2334: 			    mod_security_conf(SecFile, TopSecret)]}}].     
 2335: 
 2336: mod_security_conf(SecFile, Dir) ->
 2337:     [{data_file, SecFile},
 2338:      {max_retries, 3},
 2339:      {fail_expire_time, ?FAIL_EXPIRE_TIME},
 2340:      {block_time, 1},
 2341:      {auth_timeout, ?AUTH_TIMEOUT},
 2342:      {callback_module, ?MODULE},
 2343:      {path, Dir} %% This is should not be needed, but is atm, awful design! 
 2344:     ].
 2345:     
 2346: log_conf() ->
 2347:     [{modules, [mod_alias, mod_dir, mod_get, mod_head, mod_disk_log]},
 2348:      {transfer_disk_log, "httpd_log_transfer"},
 2349:      {security_disk_log, "httpd_log_security"},
 2350:      {error_disk_log, "httpd_log_error"},
 2351:      {transfer_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2352:      {error_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2353:      {error_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2354:      {security_disk_log_size, {1048576, 5}},
 2355:      {disk_log_format, internal}].
 2356: 
 2357: http_status(Request, Config, Expected) ->
 2358:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2359:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),    
 2360:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2361:     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 2362: 				  proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 2363: 				  transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2364: 				  proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2365: 				  http_request(Request, Version, Host),
 2366: 				  Expected ++ [{version, Version}]).
 2367: 
 2368: http_status(Request, HeadersAndBody, Config, Expected) ->
 2369:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2370:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),
 2371:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2372:     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 2373: 				  proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 2374: 				  transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2375: 				  proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2376: 				  http_request(Request, Version, Host, HeadersAndBody),
 2377: 				  Expected ++ [{version, Version}]).
 2378: 
 2379: auth_status(AuthRequest, Config, Expected) ->
 2380:     Version = proplists:get_value(http_version, Config),
 2381:     Host = proplists:get_value(host, Config),    
 2382:     Type = proplists:get_value(type, Config),
 2383:     httpd_test_lib:verify_request(proplists:get_value(type, Config), Host, 
 2384: 				  proplists:get_value(port, Config),  
 2385: 				  transport_opts(Type, Config),
 2386: 				  proplists:get_value(node, Config),
 2387: 				  AuthRequest,
 2388: 				  Expected ++ [{version, Version}]).
 2389: 
 2390: basic_auth_requiered(Config) -> 
 2391:     ok = http_status("GET /open/ ", Config,  [{statuscode, 401},
 2392: 					      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
 2393:     ok = http_status("GET /secret/ ", Config,  [{statuscode, 401},
 2394: 						{header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]),
 2395:     ok = http_status("GET /secret/top_secret/ ", Config,  [{statuscode, 401},
 2396: 						      {header, "WWW-Authenticate"}]).  
 2397: 
 2398: start_mnesia(Node) ->
 2399:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, cleanup_mnesia, []) of
 2400: 	ok ->
 2401: 	    ok;
 2402: 	Other ->
 2403: 	    ct:fail({failed_to_cleanup_mnesia, Other})
 2404:     end,
 2405:     case rpc:call(Node, ?MODULE, setup_mnesia, []) of
 2406: 	{atomic, ok} ->
 2407: 	    ok;
 2408: 	Other2 ->
 2409: 	    ct:fail({failed_to_setup_mnesia, Other2})
 2410:     end,
 2411:     ok.
 2412: 
 2413: setup_mnesia() ->
 2414:     setup_mnesia([node()]).
 2415: 
 2416: setup_mnesia(Nodes) ->
 2417:     ok = mnesia:create_schema(Nodes),
 2418:     ok = mnesia:start(),
 2419:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(httpd_user,
 2420: 				       [{attributes, 
 2421: 					 record_info(fields, httpd_user)}, 
 2422: 					{disc_copies,Nodes}, {type, set}]),
 2423:     {atomic, ok} = mnesia:create_table(httpd_group,
 2424: 				       [{attributes, 
 2425: 					 record_info(fields,
 2426: 						     httpd_group)}, 
 2427: 					{disc_copies,Nodes}, {type,bag}]).
 2428: 
 2429: cleanup_mnesia() ->
 2430:     mnesia:start(),
 2431:     mnesia:delete_table(httpd_user),
 2432:     mnesia:delete_table(httpd_group),
 2433:     stopped = mnesia:stop(),
 2434:     mnesia:delete_schema([node()]),
 2435:     ok.
 2436: 
 2437: transport_opts(ssl, Config) ->
 2438:     SSLConf = proplists:get_value(ssl_conf, Config),
 2439:     ClientConf = proplists:get_value(client_config, SSLConf),
 2440:     [proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config) | ClientConf];
 2441: transport_opts(_, Config) ->
 2442:     [proplists:get_value(ipfamily, Config)].
 2443: 
 2444: 
 2445: %%% mod_range
 2446: create_range_data(Path) ->
 2447:     PathAndFileName=filename:join([Path,"range.txt"]),
 2448:     case file:read_file(PathAndFileName) of
 2449: 	{error, enoent} ->
 2450: 	    file:write_file(PathAndFileName,list_to_binary(["12345678901234567890",
 2451: 							    "12345678901234567890",
 2452: 							    "12345678901234567890",
 2453: 							    "12345678901234567890",
 2454: 							    "12345678901234567890"]));
 2455: 	_ ->
 2456: 	    ok
 2457:     end.
 2458: 
 2459: dos_hostname(Type, Port, Host, Node, Version, Max) ->    
 2460:     TooLongHeader = lists:append(lists:duplicate(Max + 1, "a")),
 2461:     
 2462:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2463:  				       dos_hostname_request("", Version),
 2464:  				       [{statuscode, 200},
 2465:  					{version, Version}]),
 2466:     
 2467:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2468:  				       dos_hostname_request("dummy-host.ericsson.se", Version),
 2469:  				       [{statuscode, 200},
 2470:  					{version, Version}]),
 2471:     
 2472:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2473:  				       dos_hostname_request(TooLongHeader, Version),
 2474:  				       [{statuscode, request_entity_too_large_code(Version)},
 2475:  					{version, Version}]).
 2476: dos_hostname_request(Host, Version) ->
 2477:     dos_http_request("GET / ", Version, Host).
 2478: 
 2479: dos_http_request(Request,  "HTTP/1.1" = Version, Host) ->
 2480:     http_request(Request, Version, Host);
 2481: dos_http_request(Request, Version, Host) ->
 2482:     Request ++ Version ++ "\r\nhost:" ++ Host  ++ "\r\n\r\n".
 2483: 
 2484: request_entity_too_large_code("HTTP/1.0") ->
 2485:     403; %% 413 not defined in HTTP/1.0
 2486: request_entity_too_large_code(_) ->
 2487:     413.
 2488: 
 2489: length_required_code("HTTP/1.0") ->
 2490:     403; %% 411 not defined in HTTP/1.0
 2491: length_required_code(_) ->
 2492:     411.
 2493: 
 2494: garbage_content_length(Type, Port, Host, Node, Version) ->    
 2495:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2496:      				       garbage_content_length_request("GET / ", Version, Host, "aaaa"),	
 2497:      				       [{statuscode, length_required_code(Version)},
 2498:       					{version, Version}]),
 2499:     ok = httpd_test_lib:verify_request(Type, Host, Port, Node, 
 2500: 				       garbage_content_length_request("GET / ", Version, Host, 
 2501: 								      lists:duplicate($a, 100)),	
 2502:  				       [{statuscode, request_entity_too_large_code(Version)},
 2503:  					{version, Version}]).
 2504:  
 2505: garbage_content_length_request(Request, Version, Host, Garbage) ->	
 2506:     http_request(Request, Version, Host,
 2507: 		 {"content-length:" ++ Garbage, "Body with garbage content length indicator"}).
 2508: 
 2509: 
 2510: update_password(Node, ServerRoot, _Address, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, Old, New)->
 2511:     Directory = filename:join([ServerRoot, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2512:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, update_password, 
 2513: 	     [undefined, Port, Directory, Old, New, New]).
 2514: 
 2515: add_user(Node, Root, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User, Password, UserData) ->
 2516:     Addr = undefined, 
 2517:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2518:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, add_user, 
 2519: 	     [User, Password, UserData, Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2520: 
 2521: 
 2522: delete_user(Node, Root, _Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User) ->
 2523:     Addr = undefined, 
 2524:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2525:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, delete_user, [User, Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2526: remove_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2527:     %% List users, delete them, and make sure they are gone.
 2528:     case list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) of
 2529: 	{ok, Users} ->
 2530: 	    lists:foreach(fun(User) -> 
 2531: 				  delete_user(Node, ServerRoot, Host, 
 2532: 					      Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User)
 2533: 			  end,
 2534: 			  Users),
 2535: 		  {ok, []} = list_users(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir);
 2536: 	_ ->
 2537: 	    ok
 2538:     end.
 2539: 
 2540: list_users(Node, Root, _Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2541:     Addr = undefined, 
 2542:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2543:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, list_users, [Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2544: 
 2545: remove_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port,  AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2546:     {ok, Groups} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir),
 2547:     lists:foreach(fun(Group) ->
 2548: 			  delete_group(Node, Group, Port, ServerRoot, AuthPrefix, Dir)
 2549: 		  end,
 2550: 		  Groups),
 2551:     {ok, []} = list_groups(Node, ServerRoot, Host, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir).
 2552: 
 2553: delete_group(Node, Group, Port, Root, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2554:     Addr = undefined, 
 2555:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2556:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, delete_group, [Group, Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2557: 
 2558: list_groups(Node, Root, _, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir) ->
 2559:     Addr = undefined, 
 2560:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2561:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, list_groups, [Addr, Port, Directory]).
 2562: 
 2563: add_group_member(Node, Root, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, User, Group) ->
 2564:     Addr = undefined, 
 2565:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2566:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, add_group_member, [Group, User, Addr, Port, 
 2567: 					  Directory]).
 2568: list_group_members(Node, Root, Port, AuthPrefix, Dir, Group) ->
 2569:     Directory = filename:join([Root, "htdocs", AuthPrefix ++ Dir]),
 2570:     rpc:call(Node, mod_auth, list_group_members, [Group, [{port, Port}, {dir, Directory}]]).
 2571: 
 2572: getaddr() ->
 2573:     {ok,HostName} = inet:gethostname(),
 2574:     {ok,{A1,A2,A3,A4}} = inet:getaddr(HostName,inet),
 2575:     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~p.~p.~p.~p",[A1,A2,A3,A4])).
 2576: 
 2577: receive_security_event(Event, Node, Port) ->
 2578:     receive 
 2579: 	Event ->
 2580: 	    ok;
 2581: 	{'EXIT', _, _} ->
 2582: 	    receive_security_event(Event, Node, Port)
 2583:     after 5000 ->
 2584: 	    %% Flush the message queue, to see if we got something...
 2585: 	    inets_test_lib:flush()
 2586:     end.
 2587:

 2589:     Addr = undefined, % Assumed to be on the same host
 2590:     rpc:call(Node, mod_security, list_blocked_users, [Addr,Port]).
 2591: 
 2592: list_blocked_users(Node,Port,Dir) ->

 2594:     rpc:call(Node, mod_security, list_blocked_users, [Addr,Port,Dir]).
 2595:

 2599:

 2612: event(What, Port, Dir, Data) ->
 2613:     Msg = {event, What, Port, Dir, Data},
 2614:     case global:whereis_name(mod_security_test) of
 2615: 	undefined ->
 2616: 	    ok;
 2617: 	_Pid ->
 2618: 	    global:send(mod_security_test, Msg)
 2619:     end.
 2620: 
 2621: type(ip_comm) ->
 2622:     tcp;
 2623: type(_) ->
 2624:     ssl.
 2625: 
 2626: typestr(ip_comm) ->
 2627:     "tcp";
 2628: typestr(_) ->
 2629:     "ssl".
 2630: 
 2631: response_header({"server", _}) ->
 2632:     false;
 2633: response_header(Header) ->
 2634:     {true, Header}.
 2635: 
 2636: response_default_headers() ->
 2637:     [%% Add new header
 2638:      {"X-Frame-Options", "SAMEORIGIN"},
 2639:      %% Override built-in default
 2640:      {"Date", "Override-date"}].
 2641: 
 2642: peer(Config) ->
 2643:    case proplists:get_value(type, Config) of
 2644:       ssl ->
 2645:         "true";
 2646:       _ ->
 2647:         "false"
 2648:    end.   
 2649: 
 2650: start_log_watcher() ->
 2651:     Spawner = self(),
 2652:     EventDest = erlang:alias(),
 2653:     HandlerId = ?MODULE,
 2654:     _ =
 2655:         spawn(
 2656:           fun () ->
 2657:                   MonAlias =
 2658:                       monitor(process, Spawner, [{alias,reply_demonitor}]),
 2659:                   EventDest ! {started,EventDest,MonAlias},
 2660:                   receive
 2661:                       {stop,MonAlias} ->
 2662:                           _ = logger:remove_handler(HandlerId),
 2663:                           EventDest ! {stopped,EventDest},
 2664:                           ok;
 2665:                       {'DOWN',MonAlias,_,_,_} ->
 2666:                           _ = logger:remove_handler(HandlerId),
 2667:                           ok
 2668:                   end
 2669:           end),
 2670:     receive
 2671:         {started,EventDest,Watcher} ->
 2672:             Config = #{ config => EventDest },
 2673:             ok = logger:add_handler(HandlerId, ?MODULE, Config),
 2674:             {EventDest,Watcher}
 2675:     end.
 2676: 
 2677: stop_log_watcher({EventDest,Watcher}) ->
 2678:     Watcher ! {stop,Watcher},
 2679:     receive
 2680:         {stopped,EventDest} ->
 2681:             true = unalias(EventDest),
 2682:             stop_log_watcher_collect(EventDest)
 2683:     end.
 2684: %%
 2685: stop_log_watcher_collect(EventDest) ->
 2686:     receive
 2687:         {event,EventDest,Event} ->
 2688:             [Event | stop_log_watcher_collect(EventDest)]
 2689:     after 0 ->
 2690:             []
 2691:     end.
 2692: 
 2693: log(#{level := Level} = Event, #{ config := EventDest }) ->
 2694:     %% Pass on events of level 'error' or worse
 2695:     case logger:compare_levels(Level, error) of
 2696:         lt ->
 2697:             ok;
 2698:         _ ->
 2699:             EventDest ! {event,EventDest,Event},
 2700:             ok
 2701:     end.
